document.docAuthor: Rakhshani, Ehsan, Barahoei, Hossein, Ahmad, Zubair, Starý, Petr, Ghafouri-Moghaddam, Mostafa, Mehrparvar, Mohsen, Kavallieratos, Nickolas G., Čkrkić, Jelisaveta & Tomanović, Željko
document.masterDocTitle: Review of Aphidiinae parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of the Middle East and North Africa: key to species and host associations

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of Aphidiinae parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of the Middle East and North Africa: key to species and host associations

heading.emphasis: Distribution in the Middle East and North Africa

subSubSection.paragraph:
All evidence from Iran ( Starý 1979 ,
Starý et al. 2000
;
Rakhshani et al. 2008a
), refer to
Aphidius platensis (
Tomanović et al. 2014
)
. Identification-revision of this species group is recommended. Description and illustration of
Aphidius colemani in Mescheloff & Rosen 1990b
, clearly represent the diagnostic characters of
Aphidius platensis
.
